outline:
1. spring, fountain
    1. spring
      1. of source of life, joy, purification (fig.)
    2. of the eye (fig.)
    3. source (of menstruous blood)
    4. flow (of blood after child birth)
strongs_def: properly, something dug, i.e. a (general) source (of water, even when naturally flowing; also of tears, blood (by euphemism, of the female pudenda); figuratively, of happiness, wisdom, progeny)
